trans-unit.source: Specifies the display name for a property, event, or public void method which takes no arguments.
The default is the name of the property or event.

The default implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> uses reflection to search the public properties and public void methods that take no arguments.

<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> searches for the DisplayNameAttribute on each property and method and, if found, uses that string instead of the property or method name.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute"></xref> class using the display name.
The display name.
Specifies the default value for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute"></xref>.
This field is read-only.
To be added.
Gets the display name for a property, event, or public void method that takes no arguments stored in this attribute.
The display name.
Gets or sets the display name.
The display name.
Determines whether two <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute"></xref> instances are equal.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute"></xref> to test the value equality of.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the given object is equal to that of the current object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A hash code for the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DisplayNameAttribute"></xref>.
Determines if this attribute is the default.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the attribute is the default value for this attribute class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
